channel.title: Mironics abandon Mine (Shut down)
channel.description:
[s]i opened a mine, for the new people,you may dig when you see a sign that says "you may did beyond this point"
we are nere Lumbridge just look for this statue of dirt outside [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/127/symbolq.png[/img]
Block A: a very long passage that leads straight from the entrance of the mine to the digging cave Safe
Block B: there is a block B entrance on the surface, but you will have to find it yourself, otherwise use to door in block A that leads to block B, Block B leads to an abandon Gold cave, had a dungeon in it but i destroyed it still monsters lurk in it sometimes Cautious
V.i.P Block: This block is locked off to people who are not apart of the Mironics mine staff this Block features a room. wiith a few tables... mainly a meeting room. DANGEROUS If your caught in the ViP room and your nto a vip you will be killed.
Thanks. have a nice day and bring your own tools ;:3
maps: above ground http://img810.imageshack.us/i/aboveground.png/ block 1 http://img10.imageshack.us/i/block1e.png/ block 2 http://img819.imageshack.us/i/block1j.png/
V.i.P area (just for thoughs who think something is important behind that steel door of doom. http://img193.imageshack.us/i/vipqa.png/[/s]
i have closed the mine and moving it far away...
Thanks to greifers...
A better mine will come later... just farther away...

item.title: Mironics abandon Mine (Shut down)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:


Hmm what does this remind me of…?
Oh wait…

Kidding, I’m gonna be checking the mine out later.

Added more mining rooms, added a few secret doors around

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:4, topic:381633”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=477440.msg3493467#msg3493467 date=1297111131]

i opened a mine, for the new people,you may dig when you see a sign that says “you may did beyond this point”

we are nere Lumbridge just look for this statue of dirt outside

Block A: a very long passage that leads straight from the entrance of the mine to the digging cave
Safe

Block B: there is a block B entrance on the surface, but you will have to find it yourself, otherwise use to door in block A that leads to block B, Block B leads to an abandon Gold cave, had a dungeon in it but i destroyed it still monsters lurk in it sometimes
Cautious

V.i.P Block: This block is locked off to people who are not apart of the Mironics mine staff
this Block features a room. wiith a few tables… mainly a meeting room.
DANGEROUS If your caught in the ViP room and your nto a vip you will be killed.

Thanks. have a nice day and bring your own tools ;:3

howbout I go to VIP room and when somebody comes i butt smecks them with ma diamond penis
[/quote]
if you want to be a V.i.P i suggest you meet with me, and we will talk[/quote]
No
just sayin’
